name: Dead End Defence
description:
This game is a strategic and random zombie defense game.

To survive, you must strategically place multiple units to stop the invading zombies.

It's difficult and it takes luck, but I'm sure you can do it.

Good luck.

◆'Defending Mode' that blocks zombies from coming for 50 rounds.

◆'Challenge Mode' to survive in various situations and conditions.

◆11 different and distinctive units.

◆Totally free! (with some ads)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
